abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie Labyrinth of Lies, directed by Giulio Ricciarelli and starring Alexander Fehling.
lead_paragraph: The drama follows a young German prosecutor who faces stony resistance in bringing former death-camp functionaries to trial in the 1960s.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Labyrinth of Lies,’ the Frankfurt Auschwitz Trials Break a Conspiracy of Silence
headline.print_headline: Against a Wall of Resistance, Pursuing Nazi Criminals in the Blinkered ’60s

snippet: The drama follows a young German prosecutor who faces stony resistance in bringing former death-camp functionaries to trial in the 1960s.
